name: Wish (itch) (Wildflower.Mima)
description:
Wish is a TTRPG for 3+ players plus a GM.

It revolves around the members of a secret magic club. All your characters are youngsters with a passion for magic, even though it's a forbidden topic. But with your newly awakened powers and a heart full of desires, your impulsive wishes might get in the way and ruin the day. 

Have fun playing and may your wishes never come true!
